column2: You are bent low over your [Root.GetEducationTool], struggling to stay focused and to keep your eyes open, when your [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetTitledFirstName] enters. [From.GetSheHeCap] crosses the room and inspects the  [Root.GetEducationTool] over your shoulder. "Perhaps a fresh pair of eyes might prove helpful, dear [Root.GetHusbandWife]?"
You don't think I can handle this on my own?

Your [From.GetHusbandWife] has received an education in [From.GetEducationSubject], like yourself, so [From.GetSheHe] quickly grasps the nuances of the problem as you explain it. The two of you set to work, discussing and comparing [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]. [From.GetFirstName] is a most competent [From.GetEducationRole]! Within the hour, you have laid the groundwork for a promising solution.
A brilliant idea, [From.GetFirstName]! Have you any additional suggestions?
Finish your work with the help of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
Let us retire to the bedchamber, my dear...
Leave your work for now and spend some quality time with §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!...\n
